data.chText: （由于未决出胜负而进行的）重赛
data.enText: a game that is played again because neither side won in the previous game

data.chText: （录像、录音等的）重放，重演，重播
data.enText: the playing again of a short section of a film/movie, tape, etc. especially to look at or listen to sth more carefully

data.chText: 我们观看了重放的婚礼录像。
data.enText: We watched a replay of the wedding on video.

data.chText: 重演的事物；重复出现的事物
data.enText: something that is repeated or happens in exactly the same way as it did before

data.chText: 这次选举将不会是上一次的重演。
data.enText: This election will not be a replay of the last one.

data.chText: （由于未决胜负而进行的）重赛
data.enText: to play a sports game again because neither team won the first game
to play again sth that has been recorded on tape, film, etc.

data.chText: 警察一遍又一遍地重放事故的片段。
data.enText: The police replayed footage of the accident over and over again.

data.chText: 他不断回想起当时的情景。
data.enText: He replayed the scene in his mind (= he thought about it many times) .

means: (由于未决出胜负而进行的)重赛
(录像、录音等的)重放，重演，重播
(由于未决胜负而进行的)重赛

tr: the immediate rebroadcast of some action (especially sports action) that has been recorded on videotape
something (especially a game) that is played again
repeat a game against the same opponent

example: The lawyers played back the conversation to show that their client was innocent

value.boxr_value: The verb is pronounced /ˌriː'pleɪ/. The noun is pronounced /'riːpleɪ/. 动词读作/ˌriː'pleɪ/。名词读作/'riːpleɪ/。

value.def: If a match between two sports teams is replayed, the two teams play it again, because neither team won the first time, or because the match was stopped because of bad weather.

example.ex: Drawn matches were replayed three or four days later.
example.tran: 没有分出胜负的比赛在三四天后重赛。

posc.def: You can refer to a match that is replayed as a replay .

example.ex: If there has to be a replay we are confident of victory.
example.tran: 如果重新比赛，我们有信心取得胜利。

value.def: If you replay something that you have recorded on film or tape, you play it again in order to watch it or listen to it.

example.ex: He stopped the machine and replayed the message.
example.tran: 他停下机器，重新播放了一遍信息。

example.ex: I watched a slow-motion videotape replay of his fall.
example.tran: 我看了一遍录像带上他摔倒时的慢动作重放。

value.def: If you replay an event in your mind, you think about it again and again.

example.ex: She spends her nights lying in bed, replaying the fire in her mind.
example.tran: 她好多个晚上躺在床上，不断想起火灾场面。

value.tran: (反复在脑海里)重放;不断想起

trans: (体育比赛等电视画面的)即时重放，慢镜头重放
(电视画面的)即时重播，慢镜头回放
